artist: Engraver: Cherubino Alberti; Artist: After Polidoro da Caravaggio
description: center bust of man; couple at left and three couples at right; two other soldiers background center
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [G/A/ POLYDORUS DE CARAVAGIO INVENT./ Romulidae spreti ludi connubia quaerunt/ Dum cadit in quasuis rapta Sabina manus]
title: Romulidae spreti ludi connaubia quaerunt dum cadit in quasuis rapta Sabina manus
